      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void boardClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Is called whenever the tic-tac-board gui is clicked, and calls the methods for both human and computer players to add their mark to the board
      private void gameOver(java.lang.String winner)
      Called when the game is over to change the gui
      void initialize()
      Called when the GUI is initially set up, displays the buttons to start the game and a blank board
      private void startGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Starts the game, and creates the players based on the user input
      private void updateBoard()
      Adds marks to the board, and checks to see if the mark ended the game
